heading: Experience for Class A license
text:
All applicants for a class A oil-burning equipment installer license shall submit
  satisfactory proof establishing that the applicant has had at least four years practical experience within the seven years prior to
  application in the installation of oil-burning equipment under the direct and continuing supervision of a Class A-licensed oil-
  burning equipment installer in the city, including at least one year experience in the installation of oil-burning equipment for the
  use of number five and number six fuel oils.
